articles.description: In 2022, Hubble owned the record for most distant galaxy. Today, that galaxy is down to the 9th most distant object. Thanks, JWST.

articles.author: The Conversation
articles.title: Honeybees Suffer Unnecessarily in Human-Made Hives, Study Finds - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Honeybees in man-made hives may have been suffering the cold unnecessarily for over a century because commercial hive designs are based on erroneous science, my new research shows.
articles.content:
Honeybees in man-made hives may have been suffering the cold unnecessarily for over a century because commercial hive designs are based on erroneous science, my new research shows.

articles.author: VOA Learning English
articles.title: NASA Laser Communication Test Gets Data from 16 Million Kilometers Away - VOA Learning English
articles.description: NASA says a test involving a laser-based communication method successfully sent data over 16 million kilometers through deep space. The new system is expected to replace radio links long used by the American space agency.
articles.content: NASA has successfully tested a laser-based communication method that sent data over 16 million kilometers. The American space agency hopes the system will greatly improve data links between Earth and… [+4034 chars]
